children.name: Increased food waste means increased land use, 28% of the worlds agricultural land grows crops that are wasted.
Food waste increase water use, the water wasted could cover all of the worlds household needs.
Phosphorus is a critical and scarce mineral, increased food waste increases the use of this mineral.
Increased use of energy as a result of food waste amounts to 3.300.000.000 gigatons of GHG each year.
Overexploiting natural resources leads to forrest and marine habitats being lost, along with their biodiversity.
